content: {"name": "THE GEORGE PITCHFORD FOOD PANTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Church is at 492 Bramhall Ave Jersey City, NJ 07304 but the food distribution is at 509 Bramhall Ave Jersey City, New Jersey\nSummer meal program cordinator: Mary\tGurczeski\t2015475162 From: 07/08/2025\ttill: 08/08/2025", "email": "", "url": "https://ampleharvest.org/food-pantries/the-george-pitchford-food-pantry-9089/#donation-times", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "509 Bramhall Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Bergen-Lafayette", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07304", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7136982, "longitude": -74.0725815}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 333-8643", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
